resources.string: Content Descriptions add an accessible text value to a control where the control either doesn\'t have a label, or the label doesn\'t work for accessibility.
The buttons below have the content description of Submit.
Elements can be set as not important for accessibility to hide them from assistive technologies.
The buttons below aren\'t visible to TalkBack.
Hints add extra context to a control.
Headings let TalkBack customers quickly skip blocks of content.
The bottom button has no minimum size set.
Minimum size lets you ensure your controls will always be large enough to tap.
Label For lets us tie a label to a control. TalkBack will read this label when focused on the control for greater context.
